DOC.brief_summary: With study two different therapeutic exercise regimen compare patient anterior knee pain ( patellofemoral pain syndrome , PFPS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Dosage-dependence Graded Exercise Therapy Patients With Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: Exercise therapy widely use conservative treatment patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) , still consensus recommend specific rehabilitation program . This study evaluate two different therapeutic exercise regimens patient PFPS effect pain rest function . Supervised exercise therapy apply group three time week 3-month period individually tailor graded exercise program , differ group term number exercise , number repetition set , time spend perform aerobic exercise .
DOC.criteria: Presence least 3 symptom follow : Pain Walking stair Squatting Running Cycling Sitting knee flexed prolonged period time Grinding patella Other positive physical test ( Clarke ` test , patellar crepitus , tenderness upon palpation posterior surface patella , patellar facet surround structure ) Knee osteoarthrosis/ arthritis previous knee injury knee operation patellar tendinopathy Osgood Schlatter ` disease Other defined pathological condition knee
